content:
Sure, here are some websites and apps that can help you practice German verb conjugation:

1. Duolingo: A popular language-learning platform that offers interactive exercises, games, and lessons to improve German verb conjugation. 2. Lingoda: A language-learning website with personalized lessons, classes, and exercises to help you improve your German verb conjugation. 3. Babbel: An online language-learning app that offers lessons, exercises, and quizzes to improve your German verb conjugation. 4. Verbix: An online tool that conjugates German verbs in various tenses and moods. 5. Deutsch Lernen: An online resource that offers grammar lessons, exercises, and verb conjugation practice for German learners. 6. Conjugation.org: A website dedicated to verb conjugation in various languages, including German. It provides verb tables and exercises for practice. 7. Quizlet: A flashcard and study app that allows users to create their own verb conjugation flashcards for practice. Remember that different resources work for different people, so try a few and see which ones work best for you. Good luck with your German verb conjugation practice!
